blogPost.title: ROBINHOOD NOW PERMITS JUST 1 SHARE OF $GME TO BE BOUGHT ON THEIR PLATFORM ***
blogPost.author: The_Real_Fly

localize.full_text: ROBINHOOD现在只允许在其平台上购买1股$GME***。
ROBINHOOD現在只允許在其平臺上購買1股$GME***。
